item.title: CVE-2024-4214|2024-05-17T08:45:24.427Z -- Bill Minozzi -- Car Dealer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS vulnerability in Bill Minozzi Car Dealer allows Code Injection.This issue affects Car Dealer: from n/a through 4.15.
